login_description: This area is protected. You must login to access this page

ACFailure.label: AC Power Failure
ACFailure.description: No longer receiving AC power, running on battery

ACRecovery.label: AC Power Recovered
ACRecovery.description: Receiving AC power, no longer running on battery

LowBatteryModeStart.label: UPS Low Battery
LowBatteryModeStart.description: UPS is running low on battery

LowBatteryModeEnd.label: UPS Sufficient Battery
LowBatteryModeEnd.description: UPS is no longer running low on battery

BatteryTestEnd.label: UPS Battery Test Finished
BatteryTestEnd.description: UPS has finished testing the battery

Fixed.label: Fixed Delay
Fixed.description: Delay each retry by a fixed duration of time

LinearBackoff.label: Linear Backoff Delay
LinearBackoff.description: Delay each retry by a duration increasing by the provided increment

ExponentialBackoff.label: Exponential Backoff Delay
ExponentialBackoff.description: Delay each retry by an initial duration multiplying the delay by an exponent for each retry

delay_explain.duration_capacity: Delayed until either {duration} elapses or the battery capacity goes below {capacity}%
delay_explain.below_capacity: Delayed until the battery capacity goes below {capacity}%

repeat_explain.interval_capacity: Repeats every {duration} and every time the capacity decreases by {capacity}%
repeat_explain.capacity: Repeats every time the capacity decreases by {capacity}%
repeat_explain.no_limit: Will repeat until the system shuts down or the service is stopped
